newsletter.privacyNotice: User personal data is collected, processed and stored within the Mailjet service, an email management platform that adopts security measures compliant with General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) provisions. Mailjet guarantees compliance with GDPR provisions regarding the collection, processing and storage of user personal data, implementing adequate security measures to protect such data from unauthorized access, loss, alteration or involuntary disclosure.
cookiesBanner.shortNoticeDescription:
This site uses technical and third-party profiling cookies to send you targeted advertising messages and services in line with your preferences, to personalize content and ads, to provide social media functionalities, and to analyze our traffic. We also share information about how you use our site with our partners who handle web data analysis, advertising, and social media, who may combine it with other information you have provided to them or that they have collected from your use of their services. Simply closing the banner does not imply acceptance of cookies and other technologies. See our {{link}}.
Consent can be given by clicking "Accept All" or by selecting the different categories of cookies.
cookiesBanner.necessaryDetails: These cookies are necessary for the website to function and cannot be disabled in our systems.
cookiesBanner.preferencesDetails: These cookies allow the website to remember the choices made by the user and provide advanced personalized features.
cookiesBanner.statisticsDetails: These cookies allow us to count visits and traffic sources, in order to measure and improve the performance of our site.
cookiesBanner.marketingDetails: These cookies may be set through our site by our advertising partners. They may be used by these companies to build a profile of your interests and show you relevant ads on other sites. They do not directly store personal information, but are based on the unique identification of the browser and Internet device. If you do not allow these cookies, you will experience less targeted advertising.
contact_us.success_message: You will be contacted by one of our operators shortly
contact_us.no_consent_paragraph1: To contact us, send an email to {{email}} with subject "Contact Integys".
contact_us.no_consent_paragraph2: Alternatively, accept all cookies and fill out the form on this page.
contact_us.no_consent_paragraph3: You can modify cookie preferences using the "{{preferences}}" button at the bottom of the page.
